alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 8:58PM EST until March 05 at 2:45AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Eagle Creek At Phalanx Station affecting Trumbull County. For Eagle Creek in Trumbull County, including Phalanx Station, minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Eagle Creek At Phalanx Station. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Barclay Messerly Road, McConnell East, and Knowlton Roads will be flooded and impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 11.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 700 AM EST.
